text: allah â€“ avana horatu pujege ar'haru beraru illa. Avanu sada jivantanu, ellara niyantrakanu. Tukadikeyagali niddeyagali avanannu badhisuvudilla. Akasagalalliruva mattu bhumiyalliruva ellavu avanade. Avana munde, avana appane illade sipharasu madaballavaru yaru? Avara (janara) mundiruva mattu avara hindiruva ellavannu avanu ballanu. Avana jnanada yava ansavannu grahisalu avarige sadhyavilla â€“ avane icchisuvastara horatu. Avana adhikara pithavu akasagalannu mattu bhumiyannu avariside. Avugala sanraksaneya kelasavu avanannu danisuvudilla. Mattu avanu atyunnatanu, mahananu agiddane
